txt.en: Special stoves have been constructed by the Orcs of Baiúrz-mur for the brewing of poisons. The defilers specialize in using these stoves to concoct deadly liquids for evil purposes.
You have destroyed many of the stoves used for poison-craft in Baiúrz-mur.\n\nWith luck, the Orcs will not have the resources to rebuild their potion-crafting hall.
Special stoves have been constructed by the Orcs of Baiúrz-mur for the brewing of poisons. The defilers specialize in using these stoves to concoct deadly liquids for evil purposes.
Stoves used for brewing poisons can be found in Baiúrz-mur.\n\nYou should destroy the defilers' stoves as you encounter them in this Orc-infested passage of Zelem-melek.
You have destroyed many of the stoves used for poison-craft in Baiúrz-mur.\n\nWith luck, the Orcs will not have the resources to rebuild their potion-crafting hall.
